* Mayor




Contact Us

![](Images/City%20Council/Council%20Members/Duke%20Coon%20Web%20Contact.png?t=202406271441140)

Duke W. Coon

Mayor

* **Address**

Mayor Duke W. Coon
==================

![MHP_6502-Edit - Copy](https://www.cityofconroe.org/Images/City%20Council/Council%20Members/2024%20Council/MHP_6502-Edit%20-%20Copy.jpg?t=202411120927160)
The Mayor can be reached at: P.O. Box 3066, Conroe, TX 77305; by phone at (936) 522-3010; by fax at (936) 522-3009 or by
[email](mailto:duke.coon@cityofconroe.org)
.

![twitter](https://www.cityofconroe.org/_assets_/images/twitter-x.png)
